Catalonia Sagrada Familia

A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 m from Clot Metro and Train Station.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional and bright décor. It also features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Location: Eixample
